web_snippets: Carrie Aalberts aka Dementia Darling has her Master of Science focused in Gerontology and has worked alongside seniors for the last ten years.
I'm Carrie Aalberts, also known as Dementia Darling. With a Master of Science specializing in Gerontology and over a decade of experience in dementia care.
My name is Carrie Aalberts, and for the past almost five years, I have gone by the persona of “Dementia Darling” on social media and beyond!
